text: He aheta (hajace dharmika vidhi) ani jo, allahane nirdharita kelelya pratisthapurna gostinca adara rakhela tara he tyacya palanakartyajavala tyacyakarita uttama ahe ani tumacyasathi gure-dhore halala (vaidha) tharavile gele aheta, matra tyancyakherija, jyanca adesa tumhala aikavila gela ahe, yastava murtincya malinatepasuna dura raha, ani khote bolanyapasunahi alipta raha
